short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SecurityPal Copilot offers AI-Driven assistance for security and GRC queries for efficient, automated security questionnaires.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SecurityPal Copilot is the trusted AI security assistant for instantaneous query handling for any security, compliance, and privacy questionnaire. SecurityPal customers can pose any query in natural language, and Copilot swiftly crafts accurate, evidence-based responses – right from the browser. It’s a great way to quickly knock out small requests from companies inquiring about your security posture, with minimal manual effort from your internal resources. 

Note: You must have an existing SecurityPal account to use this extension.

Features:
- AI-Driven Assistance: Leverage AI for developing accurate, swift security responses.
- Bulk Question Handling: Tackle multiple queries efficiently.
- Multilingual Capabilities: Draft responses in various languages for global reach.
- Knowledge Library Integration: Ensure consistency and accuracy with seamless knowledge library integration.
